title: Singapore pork and prawn noodles
description: Swap the pork and prawns for tofu to make this dish vegetarian. Noodles are always a great choice for when you need a meal in minutes – 15 to be precise.
ingredients: 1-2 red chillies, deseeded (optional – leave in if you like spicy food) and roughly chopped

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large heavy-based frying pan or wok over a high heat. Fry the mince for 2 minutes, stirring, to brown.

method.Step 2: Turn the heat down to medium-high, add the spices and stir-fry for 3 minutes, then add the prawns, carrots and chillies. Cook for 3 more minutes, then add the noodles, pak choi and 2 tbsp water.

method.Step 3: Stir-fry, scraping the bottom of the pan to loosen any crispy bits, for another 1-2 minutes until the prawns and mince are cooked through, the vegetables are just tender and the noodles are heated through. Serve straightaway sprinkled with the spring onions and soy sauce.
